remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存在於集合中，它會傳回。If the exists in the collection, it is returned. 如果的集合中沒有指定，會發生下列情況：If the does not exist in the collection for a given , the following happens: |MissingMappingActionMissingMappingAction|採取的動作Action taken| |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|會建立物件與指定`sourceTable`來源資料表的名稱並`dataSetTable`做為資料表名稱。Creates a object with the given `sourceTable` as the source table name and `dataSetTable` as the table name. 建立物件不會加入至集合。The created object is not added to the collection.| |`Error`|會產生例外狀況。An exception is generated. `dataSetTable`參數會被忽略。The `dataSetTable` parameter is ignored.| |`Ignore`|取得 `null`。Gets `null`. `dataSetTable`參數會被忽略。The `dataSetTable` parameter is ignored.| ## Examples 下列範例會搜尋具有集合中指定的來源資料表名稱。The following example searches for a with the given source table name within the collection. 如果物件存在，它會傳回它。If the object exists, it is returned. 此範例假設集合和已建立物件。The example assumes that a collection and a object have been created. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.GetTableMappingBySchemaAction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.GetTableMappingBySchemaAction Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.GetTableMappingBySchemaAction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.GetTableMappingBySchemaAction Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
